items.sentence: I\'ve asked you repeatedly not to sing so late at night.
I doubt that Tom would ever consider going to Australia.
Tom\'s daughter as well as his sons all went to college.
I\'d rather spend money on something I\'d actually wear.
Tom\'s dog is still waiting just outside the front door.
You\'re going to thank Tom for the present, aren\'t you?
You\'re the only one I\'d consider going to Boston with.
You\'d be amazed how much time Tom spends playing games.
Tom tells us more about what\'s going on than Mary does.
The jokes you told us the other day weren\'t very funny.
